short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HTML Tag Checker for SEO and Development

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension aims to help you analyze HTML source code easily, including from an SEO perspective.

- Main tab: You can see title, description, keywords, canonical url, hreflang and favicons.

- Heading tab: You can see h1~h6 tags

- Social tab: You can see meta og and twitter tags.

- Image tab: You can see img tags and CSS background images with sizes.

- A Link tab: You can see A tags

- JS Tab: You can see script tags and pre... link tags (e.g. preconnect, prefetch).
